sentences.en: Agree on a date when the team will reconvene and review the progress on action items.
sentences.cn: 商定小组重新开会和评审行动进展的日期.

sentences.en: It was certainly serious enough for him to reconvene Parliament.
sentences.cn: 他重新召集国会当然是件非常重大的事了。

sentences.en: Large Wall Clock: so all can see when the stand-up will start or when meetings will reconvene.
sentences.cn: 大型挂钟：通过它所有的人都能知道立会何时开始，或何时召集会议。

sentences.en: The conference might reconvene after its opening session.
sentences.cn: 大会在开幕式结束后可能要再开会。

sentences.en: The finance committee decided to reconvene later in the afternoon.
sentences.cn: 财务委员会决定稍后于下午再召开.

trans.tran_cn: 重新集合，重新召集，再召开
